about.title: About Me
about.intro: You can call me River Fish or Felix. I'm a software developer from China. An adventurer/gambler who enjoys the journey.
about.workDescription: My overall work experience has been quite adventurous with a gambling flavor. I've joined early-stage Midjourney, early-stage MyShell, late-stage Li Yizhou's tech team, and so on. Currently, I'm co-founding a startup focused on overseas AI projects (profitable, no funding needed). My main responsibilities are: on the engineering side - driving the entire application and taking on some growth responsibilities; on the model side - implementing all image-related requirements.
about.lifeDescription: I'm married with a kid. But the main theme of my life is still opening my eyes to look at data and write code. For enjoyment, I like to drink good quality alcohol.
about.dreamsDescription: Already realized~ Enjoying the fun of gambling and adventure, and the pleasure of immersion.
about.blogPurposeReason: A gambler wants an audience to cheer, a creator needs recognition of the value of their content.
about.timelinePart1Title: Two and a Half Years Ago
about.timelinePart1Description: I was more focused on engineering (bundling/dependencies/optimization/engineering scenarios), source code (Vue/React/tools), interview skills, and algorithms.
about.timelinePart2Title: One and a Half Years Ago
about.timelinePart2Description: Got in touch with overseas ecosystems, models (among audio, image, and text, I've only not been to a foundational text model company), App development, backend, and DevOps.
about.timelinePart3Description: Directly dealing with technology, data, money, and people~ This should be the fastest growing period - in all senses.
